title: Issues with queue times
body:
Hiya.

I've been always playing Blind Pick because I didn't like to wait long in queue and champion select. Recently however, the queues got LONG. Like, above 10 minutes at minimum. I'm waiting in a queue while writing this as a matter of fact.

So, firstly - I would love to know if anyone else has the issues with long queues in blind pick (preferably on EUNE).

And secondly - I would appreciate any response from Rito (as to why the queues are so long and if you are planning to do anything with them - or maybe even check if it's a problem with my account).

Here's a queue I was sitting in today (it found game shortly after):
http://imgur.com/a/0u4fG

And this is the queue I am sitting in right now:
http://imgur.com/a/UvRsJ

I find it to be very significant and it only gets worse.

replies.body:
There a number of factors that determine how long your queue times will be, however, the most impactful are your matchmaking rating (Elo) and the time of day you're playing. If you're at the extreme spectrums of matchmaking rating, it will take longer to find players that are a fair match for you. Additionally, if you're playing during a time when players at your skill level aren't as active, it will also affect your queue time. For complete information on matchmaking, [check out our FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752954-Matchmaking-Guide#q6)

Let me know if you have any other questions.

Both of those games were played during Sunday - and the 2nd one was played in the afternoon too (really, Sunday afternoon should be rather active, no matter the "elo") - but the queue times seem to be high no matter the time.

Besides, I thought that normals have a higher tolerance as far as skill level goes (considering it's not a competetive mode).

Ah well, thanks for answer anyways.
